text: Fiona Shaw (born Fiona Mary Wilson; 10 July 1958) is an Irish actress and theatre and opera director. She is known for her roles as Petunia Dursley in the Harry Potter movie series (2001–2010), Marnie Stonebrook in the fourth season of the HBO series True Blood (2011),Edgware Times and Carolyn Martens in the critically acclaimed BBC spy thriller series Killing Eve (2018–2022). ==Personal life== Shaw is openly a lesbian. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish voice actors Category:Irish theatre directors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Irish LGBT people Category:LGBT actors Category:Lesbians
title: Fiona Shaw
